description: The Co-op in Newbury was broken into and burgled during the early hours, police say.
title: Newbury Co-op hit by ram-raiders for fourth time
title_page: Newbury Co-op hit by ram-raiders for fourth time - BBC News
maintext:
A shop has been targeted by ram-raiders for a fourth time.
Robbers smashed their way into the Co-op store in Essex Street in Wash Common, Newbury, at about 02:00 GMT.
The business, which has been forced to temporarily close, was targeted twice in 2019 and once in 2023.
Thames Valley Police is investigating and asked anyone with information or footage to come forward. The force has been asked if anything had been stolen.
